div.p: This code system http://www.ncpdp.org/dispensed-as-written-or-product-selection-code defines many codes, but they are not represented here

title.value: NCPDP Dispensed As Written Or Product Selection Code

description.value: Prescriber's instruction regarding substitution of generic equivalents or order to dispense the specific prescribed medication. NCPDP field # 408-D8.

copyright.value: NCPDP codes are available by subscription at ncpdp.org. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
